description: I use this IRC client (even if I use GNOME) because the server component is easy to setup. I install the server component on a machine that is always connected to the internet, and the Quassel client (that I install on several computers) connects to the Quassel server. That way, I don't miss any discussion and I can close the client when I don't want to be distracted.
summary: Easy to setup the server side to be always connected on IRC

description:
es imposible conectarse a las redes de IRC, como Hispano, por ejemplo.
cosa que en otras distribuciones Linux funciona perfectamente
